about_the_game:
The World
LingQi is a magical energy between heaven and earth, and is the foundation of the entire World. Grass, trees, mountains and rocks become spiritual materials under the influence of LingQi, and even more, they can be born as spiritual beasts. Spirits absorb the LingQi to strengthen themselves, and adapt to the wilderness of the weak and the strong.

Tower Defense
The spiritual materials in the traveling bag have a fatal attraction to the monsters, and these materials are indispensable to the refining of weapons. So the refiner must do everything he can to fend off the monsters and bring the materials back safely.
In the wilderness, consume LingQi to set up turrets and use them to defend against monsters while also collecting spiritual materials by mining different ores or trees to use as weapon refineries.

Weapon Refining
After successfully bringing back spiritual materials, the refiner can refine these materials into spiritual weapons to be used as new turrets. Each type of turret has different effects.
The higher the refining level, the higher the success rate of refining. Each time you refine a spirit weapon, you will raise your experience and sharpen your refining level. As more and more spirit weapons are refined, the refiner's dusty memories will gradually revive and recall more recipes.

short_description: The Poor Artifact Maker is a tower defense game based on Chinese fairy legends. The refiner has to explore the dangerous world in order to find his lost companion. The only way to overcome the endless ferocious beasts in the wilderness is to keep collecting materials to refine spiritual weapons
